resources.string: The \'New Game\' and \'Continue\' options allow you to play a randomised game. Enter numbers into the boxes, before checking that your solution is correct. Each day that you complete one puzzle increases your daily streak.
This app was developed for the CE881 Module Assignment. \n Author: Fred Knight \n Registration Number: 1804162

The \'Solver\' option allows for you to enter values into an empty puzzle; from which a solution will be produced if possible. Although a single solution will be given, there may be multiple solutions to a puzzle.

Sudoku is played on a grid of 9 x 9 spaces. Within the rows and columns are 9 “squares” (made up of 3 x 3 spaces). Each row, column and square (9 spaces each) needs to be filled out with the numbers 1–9, without repeating any numbers within the row, column or square.
Starting a new game will overwrite any progress on a previous game!
